trans-unit.source: Acts as a base class for deriving custom settings providers in the application settings architecture.
trans-unit.target: 做為應用程式設定架構中衍生自訂設定提供者的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: A settings provider defines the mechanism for storing configuration data used in the application settings architecture.
trans-unit.target: 設定提供者會定義儲存在應用程式設定架構所使用的組態資料的機制。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework contains a single default settings provider, <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider>, which stores configuration data to the local file system.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 包含單一的預設設定提供者， <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider>，它會儲存到本機檔案系統的組態資料。

trans-unit.source: However, you can create alternate storage mechanisms by deriving from the abstract <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以建立另一個儲存機制，藉由衍生自抽象<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: The provider that a wrapper class uses is determined by decorating the wrapper class with the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 包裝函式類別所使用的提供者由裝飾的包裝函式類別<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProviderAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: If this attribute is not provided, the default, <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider>, is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性未提供，預設值， <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider>，會使用。

trans-unit.source: When you create a custom settings provider, at minimum, you must provide implementations for the three methods of this class: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.GetPropertyValues%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.SetPropertyValues%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.ApplicationName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立自訂的設定提供者，最小值時，您必須提供這個類別的三個方法的實作： <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.GetPropertyValues%2A>，<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.SetPropertyValues%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.ApplicationName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For client applications, you can add more standardized functionality to a custom provider by also implementing the <xref:System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應用程式，您可以加入更多的標準化的功能的自訂提供者也實作<xref:System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider>介面。

trans-unit.source: This interface mirrors methods found in the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase> class, which mainly enables versioning support.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面會反映方法中找到<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>類別，主要是讓 版本管理支援。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should design settings providers to be single-instanced to avoid storage resource contention.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該設計為單一執行個體，以避免儲存體資源爭用的設定提供者。

trans-unit.source: Providers should also be thread-safe because they can be called simultaneously from multiple wrapper instances in a single application domain or from multiple applications in different domains.
trans-unit.target: 提供者也應該是安全執行緒，因為它們可以同時呼叫從單一應用程式網域中的多個包裝函式執行個體或不同網域中的多個應用程式。

trans-unit.source: At minimum, a settings provider must recognize three attributes—<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute>, <xref:System.Configuration.UserScopedSettingAttribute>, and <xref:System.Configuration.DefaultSettingValueAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 最小值，設定提供者必須辨識三個屬性 —<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute>， <xref:System.Configuration.UserScopedSettingAttribute>，和<xref:System.Configuration.DefaultSettingValueAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: For a full listing of attributes that can be applied to application settings, see [Application Settings Attributes](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-attributes.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以套用至應用程式設定屬性的完整清單，請參閱[應用程式設定屬性](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-attributes.md)。

trans-unit.source: A custom setting provider should resolve attributes applied to settings properties in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: 自訂設定提供者應該解決屬性套用至設定屬性，以下列方式：

trans-unit.source: If the provider can fulfill the request implied by the attribute, obviously it should do so.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者可以滿足屬性所隱含的要求，顯然它應如此做。

trans-unit.source: If the provider cannot fulfill the request, it should ignore it silently.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者無法滿足要求，它應該以無訊息模式忽略它。

trans-unit.source: If two or more properties conflict; for example, a property being decorated with both <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute> and <xref:System.Configuration.UserScopedSettingAttribute>; the provider should throw a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個或多個屬性衝突。例如，正在裝飾與這兩個屬性<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute>和<xref:System.Configuration.UserScopedSettingAttribute>; 提供者應該擲回<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is this default protected constructor for this abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 這是這個預設受保護建構函式的這個抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Derived custom settings providers are not required to provide an explicit constructor because the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Initialize%2A> method typically performs all initialization.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的自訂設定提供者不需要提供明確的建構函式，因為<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Initialize%2A>方法通常會執行所有的初始化。

trans-unit.source: Client code typically does not directly instantiate a settings provider; instead, you use the following procedure to find a settings provider for a particular settings property:
trans-unit.target: 用戶端程式碼通常未直接執行個體化設定提供者。相反地，您可以使用下列程序來尋找特定的設定屬性的設定提供者：

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A> method on the current <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to return a reference to the current <xref:System.Configuration.ISettingsProviderService>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A>方法在目前<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>傳回參考目前<xref:System.Configuration.ISettingsProviderService>。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Configuration.ISettingsProviderService.GetSettingsProvider%2A> method of the <xref:System.Configuration.ISettingsProviderService> retrieved in the first step to return the settings provider.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.ISettingsProviderService.GetSettingsProvider%2A>方法<xref:System.Configuration.ISettingsProviderService>傳回設定提供者的第一個步驟中所擷取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the currently running application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前正在執行之應用程式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the application's shortened name, which does not contain a full path or extension, for example, <c>SimpleAppSettings</c>.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，其中包含應用程式的簡短的名稱，不包含完整路徑或副檔名，例如， <c>SimpleAppSettings</c>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.ApplicationName%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> properties help to disambiguate similarly named setting properties in different applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.ApplicationName%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A>屬性有助於釐清同樣的具名的設定不同的應用程式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsContext" /> describing the current application use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsContext" />，描述目前應用程式的使用方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection" /> containing the settings property group whose values are to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection" />，包含要擷取其值的設定屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of settings property values for the specified application instance and settings property group.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之應用程式執行個體和設定屬性群組的設定屬性值集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValueCollection" /> containing the values for the specified settings property group.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValueCollection" />，包含指定設定屬性群組的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.GetPropertyValues%2A> method must be implemented to handle special settings, those marked with <xref:System.Configuration.SpecialSettingAttribute>, as well as reconcile application and user settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.GetPropertyValues%2A>方法必須實作以處理特殊的設定、 標記與那些<xref:System.Configuration.SpecialSettingAttribute>，以及協調應用程式和使用者設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsContext" /> describing the current application usage.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsContext" />，描述目前應用程式的使用方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValueCollection" /> representing the group of property settings to set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValueCollection" />，表示要設定的屬性設定群組。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of the specified group of property settings.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定屬性設定群組的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase> contains the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A> method, which is called to persist the values of all of its settings properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase> 包含<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A>方法，呼叫以保存所有其設定屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This method enumerates through all the settings providers associated with its settings properties, and calls the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.SetPropertyValues%2A> method for each <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> to perform the actual serialization operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法透過所有的設定會列舉其設定屬性和呼叫相關聯的提供者<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.SetPropertyValues%2A>每個方法<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider>執行實際的序列化作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.SetPropertyValues%2A> method should be implemented with security in mind:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider.SetPropertyValues%2A>方法應該實作的安全性考量事項：

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted code should be allowed to update application settings.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的程式碼應允許更新應用程式設定。

trans-unit.source: Partially trusted code should be allowed to update only user application settings.
trans-unit.target: 更新使用者應用程式設定，應該允許部分信任的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Untrusted code is not typically allowed to update application settings.
trans-unit.target: 不受信任的程式碼通常不允許更新應用程式設定。

trans-unit.source: Usage quotas should be considered to guard against resource attacks by partially trusted applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用量配額應視為防衛資源攻擊由部分信任的應用程式。
